sections.heading: Official Tekton GitHub actions
sections.text:
This repository holds
official
GitHub actions to be used in your GitHub Workflows.

children.heading: setup-tektoncd
children.text:
Action to rollout
Tekton Pipeline
,
CLI (
tkn
)
and a
Container-Registry
instance, setting up the environment for testing using these components.
Example usage below with inputs using default values:
---
jobs
:
setup-tektoncd
:
steps
:
#
using KinD to provide the Kubernetes instance and kubectl
-
uses
:
helm/kind-action@v1.5.0
with
:
cluster_name
:
kind
#
setting up Tekton Pipelines, CLI and additional components...
-
uses
:
tektoncd/actions/setup-tektoncd@main
with
:
pipeline_version
:
latest
setup_registry
:
"
true
"
patch_etc_hosts
:
"
true
"
See more on
setup-tektoncd/README.md
.

children.heading: setup-tektoncd-cli
children.text:
Action to install the
Tekton CLI (
tkn
)
.
Example usage below with inputs using some default values:
---
jobs
:
setup-tektoncd-cli
:
steps
:
      -
uses
:
tektoncd/actions/setup-tektoncd-cli@main
with
:
version
:
latest
By default the action is set to install
latest
release, use the
version
input for a specific target.
